refnamediv.refpurpose: Set the value of an SNMP object

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
host
The hostname of the SNMP agent (server).
community
The write community.
object_id
The SNMP object id.
type
&snmp.set.type.values; &snmp.set.type.values.asn.mapping; &snmp.set.type.values.equal.note; &snmp.set.type.values.bitset.note;
value
The new value.
timeout
The number of microseconds until the first timeout.
retries
The number of retries in case of timeouts.
